name: Monks of the Twilight Timer
description: Hailing from Widowâ€™s Peak, the Monks of the Twilight Timer capture moonlight in a moonlight condenser - old technology created by the Gibbun in order to distill moonlight for further processing. Now biding their time, secretly bestowing life upon inanimate things, they look towards the future with a glint in their eye. Their future is bright. The only question: what comes next?
